SELECT C.BIZ_GROUP AS JOB_CD ,(SELECT SC.CODE_NAME FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE SC --,FMS_UPJANG C WHERE SC.GROUP_CODE IN ('FM0004') AND SC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND SC.CODE = C.BIZ_GROUP) AS JOB_NAME -- ,C.JOB_NAME ,C.BIZ_DETAIL AS SUB_JOB_CD ,(SELECT SC.CODE_NAME FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE SC --,FMS_UPJANG C WHERE SC.GROUP_CODE IN ('FM0021') AND SC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND SC.CODE = C.BIZ_GROUP) AS SUB_JOB_NAME --,C.SUB_JOB_NAME ,A.UPJANG ,C.UPJANGNM_DISP AS UPJANGNM ,B.RECIPE_CD ,B.RECIPE_NAME ,B.RECIPE_CD || A.UPJANG AS RECIPE_CD_SORT ,B.RECIPE_NAME || A.UPJANG AS RECIPE_NAME_SORT ,G.ITEM_CODE ,H.ITEM_NAME ,ROUND(AVG(NEED_QTY),2) AS NEED_QTY_AVG FROM FMM_MENU A ,FMM_RECIPE B ,FMS_UPJANG C ,FMM_RECIPE_ITEM G ,( SELECT ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_SIZE, PO_UOM, KG_CONVERT_RATE FROM HLDC_PO_ITEM_MST WHERE ITEM_CLASS1 = 'F' ) H
,FMR_STD_RECIPE_MST F
WHERE A.UPJANG = B.UPJANG AND A.MENU_CD = B.MENU_CD AND A.UPJANG = C.UPJANG AND B.UPJANG = G.UPJANG AND B.MENU_CD = G.MENU_CD AND B.RECIPE_CD = G.RECIPE_CD AND G.ITEM_CODE = H.ITEM_CODE
AND A.UPJANG = #UPJANG#
AND B.SUBINV_CLASS = #HALL_CLASS#
AND A.MEAL = #MEAL#
AND A.CORNER = #CORNER#
AND B.RECIPE_CLASS = #RECIPE_CLASS#
AND B.RECIPE_TYPE = #RECIPE_TYPE#
AND B.CUISINE_TYPE = #CUISINE_TYPE#
AND B.RECIPE_NAME LIKE '%' || #RECIPE_NAME# || '%'
AND A.MENU_DATE BETWEEN #FROM_MENU_DATE# AND #TO_MENU_DATE#
AND B.RECIPE_CD = F.RECIPE_CD AND TO_CHAR(F.CDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #FROM_DT# AND #TO_DT#
GROUP BY C.BIZ_GROUP,C.BIZ_DETAIL,A.UPJANG,C.UPJANGNM_DISP,B.RECIPE_CD,B.RECIPE_NAME,G.ITEM_CODE,H.ITEM_NAME ORDER BY C.BIZ_GROUP,C.BIZ_DETAIL,C.UPJANGNM_DISP,B.RECIPE_CD,B.RECIPE_NAME,G.ITEM_CODE,H.ITEM_NAME
